text: [Alice]: I noticed that while I was in the Cafeteria starting the coffee maker, I didn't see anyone else around, which makes me wonder if those who moved to different rooms might be trying to isolate themselves; we should definitely keep an eye on them.

[Bob]: I agree with Alice, and to add to that, my consistent presence in Medbay completing diagnostics might explain why I haven't encountered anyone suspicious, but it's vital we compare task progress to identify discrepancies.
[Erin]: I agree with Alice and Bob; let's compare task completion times and locations to see if anyone's movements don't align with their reported tasks.
[Charlie]: I concur with Alice, Bob, and Erin's proposed timeline comparison, and I can confirm seeing them in the Cafeteria earlier, suggesting their accounts are reliable.
